Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its high worth of $15000 to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $12500 for this exceptional product. This offer includes comprehensive support and a 1-year warranty, ensuring a smooth integration into your existing systems. I look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your business processes. Kindly let me know if you're interested in exploring this opportunity further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
